thread.title: The Most Iconic Dishes From Around The World
thread.title_full: The Most Iconic Dishes From Around The World

author: Kate Bratskeir
title: The Most Iconic Dishes From Around The World
text:
The Most Iconic Dishes From Around The World A vacation bucket list for your tastebuds. Kate Bratskeir Food and Health Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 10/15/2015 11:13 AM EDT | Edited: 20 minutes ago 
If you're venturing off to the breathtaking sights of San Sebasti√°n, you sure as heck should have some paella while you're there. The rice-based dish with fresh seafood, meats and vegetables is part of Spain's culture; it's typically served family-style to prompt all grumbling stomachs to gather and enjoy the flavors together. The proteins and veggies may vary based on individual preferences, but for the most part, paella is always cooked in a large, shallow pan over an open flame . 
Every country has its own iconic dish, a meal that would a real shame not to taste in the land of its origin. Before you escape to your next getaway, make sure you know what kind of vacation your tastebuds will be going on, too. Check out the infographic from Perfect Stays below; the food itself may inspire your next trip.
